updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policy based Source IP address (user or egress IP)
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create  Egress IP policy matching netwrok location profile as Source IP and/or User IP - [Source IP can be setup as user - local mac vpn IP]
- Review egress_ip_policy.json schema
- Route traffic from ns-client or on proxy ; matching above conditions
 [curl -k -H'host: ifconfig.me' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Source IP json schema:
"net_location_obj": [ "1","3"]

User IP json schema:
"userip_location_obj": ["1","3"]

- Verify Source IP and User based Egress IP policy is matched
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is picked  indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()

updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policy based Source IP address (user or egress IP); Exclusion negate: true
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; Negating netwrok location profile as Source IP and/or User IP [USER IP can be set as XFF IP to send in curl command]
- Review egress_ip_policy.json schema
- Route traffic from ns-client or on proxy 
 [curl -k -H'host: ifconfig.me' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is not picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is being picked but egressIP so_mark is not applied.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify Source IP/User based Egress IP policy is not matched 
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is NOT picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is NOT picked (Negated/excluded) indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()

updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policy based Application or App Suite
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy for app : Box , google drive, Dropbox
- Review egress_ip_policy.json schema
- Route traffic from ns-client or on proxy 
 [curl -k -H'host: box.com' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is being picked  indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify  Egress IP policy is matched for box.com and other applications traffic added 
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()

updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policy based Category
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy for category : cloudapp, social media, etc
- Review egress_ip_policy.json schema
- Route traffic from ns-client or on proxy 
 [curl -k -H'host: ifconfig.me' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is being picked  indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify  Egress IP policy is matched for category tarffic - Box/dropbox [cloadapp], snapchat.com, facebook.com [social media]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()

updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policy based Destination domain
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Configure Egress IP policy on Destination Domain 
- Add domains list comma separated, 
- Route traffic from ns-client or on proxy 
 [curl -k -H'host: ifconfig.me' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is being picked  indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify  Egress IP policy is matched fordomain configured [ifconfig.me, boxcloud.com]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()

updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policy based Destination domain ; with wild card support
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Configure Egress IP policy on Destination Domain 
- Add domains list comma separated, with simple wildcard support [eg. *.google.com, www.box.com]
- Try with Non American domains [*.eu]
- Route traffic from ns-client or on proxy 
 [curl -k -H'host: ifconfig.me' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is being picked  indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify  Egress IP policy is matched for domain configured [*.google.com, www.box.com, *.boxcloud.com]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()

updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policy based Destination domain ; with negation (exclusion)-  Not supported R107 By webui
updated_cases.custom_steps: Need to check with DEV if negate will be available in webUI to negate for destnation domains

updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policy based Destination domain ; with URL List
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Custom category with URL list [Need to review with dev how http/2 domains would impact]
- Add domains list comma separated, with simple wildcard support [eg. *.google.com, *.box.com, *.example.com]
- Route traffic from ns-client or on proxy 
 [curl -k -H'host: ifconfig.me' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is being picked  indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify  Egress IP policy is matched for domain configured [*.google.com, www.box*.com, *.boxcloud.com]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
